title: GMFB: The GMFB Wine Club
itunes:title: GMFB: The GMFB Wine Club
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: Nate discusses working at Reggie Bush’s charity event (:56) what he knows about Calvin Johnson’s retirement (4:24); Peter shares stories from his time in Napa Valley and his newfound appreciation for wine (7:32); Kyle shares a story of the most expensive wine he’s had (15:09) and his upcoming family trip (18:44); The group shares some training camp storylines they are excited about (27:02); Is it Super Bowl or bust for the Patriots? (34:33) and finally, the beauty of training camp battles (40:19)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
